channel.title: Taylor Sheridan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Taylor Sheridan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Taylor Sheridan Partners With Paramount on New Studio in Texas
item.description: The venture comes after Texas bolstered its incentive program for movies and TV shows. The facility will be home to productions in the Sheridan-verse.

item.title: Taylor Sheridan Partners With Paramount on New Studio in Texas
item.description: The venture comes after Texas bolstered its incentive program for movies and TV shows. The facility will be home to productions in the Sheridan-verse.

item.title: Taylor Sheridan’s ‘Landman’ Announces Season 2 Premiere Date
item.description: The Paramount+ series sets a return for the drama series, which adds Sam Elliott in the new season.

item.title: Taylor Sheridan’s ‘Landman’ Announces Season 2 Premiere Date
item.description: The Paramount+ series sets a return for the drama series, which adds Sam Elliott in the new season.

item.title: ‘Tulsa King’ Season 3 Gets Premiere Date, Teases New Enemy for Sylvester Stallone
item.description: ‘Tulsa King’ is returning this fall as Paramount+ announces new details about the show.

item.title: ‘Tulsa King’ Season 3 Gets Premiere Date, Teases New Enemy for Sylvester Stallone
item.description: ‘Tulsa King’ is returning this fall as Paramount+ announces new details about the show.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.
